overview: In 2030, with the rapid development of science and technology, we ushered in a "fast" society, with increasingly fierce competition and poor communication.  Molly (played by Chen Sinuo) is a special 11-year-old girl. She is fascinated by plants and has a magical imagination, but she is introverted and timid, and it is difficult for her to make friends.  Under the guidance of her botanist father (played by Wang Qianyuan), Molly imagines different people as animals with personalities in order to break the communication gap.  However, the unexpected disappearance of my father broke the original harmony of the family.  A year later, my mother (played by Jiang Qinqin) almost gave up the search and rescue.  Molly, who firmly believes that her father is alive, decides to find a way to find her father together with her useless robot Aru. There, she will face the challenges that must be overcome in life...
title: Check, Check, Can You Hear Me
